description.value: You know more kitsune magic. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Bane], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Object], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sanctuary]. You can cast this as a 1st-rank divine innate spell once that day.

value.value: at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat
